name: Electro Ball
summary: Deals more damage the faster the user is compared to the target. If the target's Speed is more than 50% of the user's, Electro Ball has a base power of 60. If it's between 34% - 50%, the BP is 80. Between 25% - 33% is 120, and less than 25% has a base power of 150.
viability: This can be incredibly dangerous on a Choice Scarf user like Raichu. It must be used on a Pokemon with an already great Speed stat, though, to maximize its potential.
